meanings.definition: A short form of the word "cigarette"
meanings.sent1: I saw him smoking a cig outside the store.
meanings.sent2: She always carries a pack of cigs in her purse.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cig cross the road? To get to the lighter side!
meanings.sent4: The cig was like a tiny companion, always there in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The smell of a fresh cig lingered in the air, tempting passersby.

meanings.definition: A small, cylindrical roll of tobacco for smoking
meanings.sent1: He offered me a cig during our break at work.
meanings.sent2: The shop sells various brands of cigs behind the counter.
meanings.sent3: The cig rolled off the table and onto the floor, trying to escape its fate.
meanings.sent4: The smoke from the cig danced in the air like a mysterious veil.
meanings.sent5: The flickering flame of the lighter illuminated the end of the cig in the dark.
